nodes.text: Garth was an individual with green skin and yellow eyes who worked at the Horville's Hut of Horrors attraction on the Forest Moon of Endor. In 3 ABY, Garth was working as a snake eater at the hut when a group of young Ewoks came to visit the attraction.

Horville, the owner of the attraction, called for the Ewoks to step inside and take a look at what he had to offer. He gestured to Garth, who hissed as several snakes protruded from his mouth. The Ewoks found the display frightening and screamed. Later that day, when the Ewok Teebo found himself covered in sugar leaf taffy, the wokling Malani equivalated his appearance to that of Garth. The reminder of Garth made the Ewoks burst into tears.
Later that night, one of the woklings had a nightmare featuring Garth. However, the wokling did not experience the dream, as it was dispersed by a dream sucking device.

Garth appeared in "Horville's Hut of Horrors," the sixteenth episode in the second season of the animated television series Ewoks. The episode was written by Paul Dini and premiered on November 15, 1986.
